#include<iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<stack>
#include<limits.h>
//#include<conio.h>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
#include<cstdio>
#define scan(a) scanf("%d",&a)
#define print(a) printf("%d\n",a)
int main(){
	int t,n,i,arr[101];
	scan(t);
	scan(n);
	while(t--){
		for(i=0;i<n;i++){
			scan(arr[i]);
		}
		sort(arr,arr+i);
		int diff=arr[n-1]-arr[0];
		print(diff);
	}
//	getch();
	return 0;
}
